name: Hinkley
0:
”Alexa, turn on fan light”
”Alexa, turn off fan light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
After connecting Alexa to your products in a few simple steps, you can simply ask Alexa to control your Hinkley products, such as: fans and landscape.
(1) Download our "Hinkley" app on the app marketplace and then register an account.
(2) Configure our devices in our “Hinkley” app and change appropriate name for your devices and locations.
(3) Download Amazon "Alexa" app from android, ios or Amazon app market then configure Echo with "Alexa" app.
(4) Enable “Alexa” controls on the “Hinkley” app, you'll be navigated to the login page, follow the instructions on the page to complete linking.
(5) Now all setup is finished. You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
Alexa, turn on fan light.
Alexa, turn off fan light.
Alexa, dim fan light to 20%.
Alexa, turn on fan.
Alexa, turn off fan.
Alexa, turn on landscape control.
Alexa, turn off landscape control.
Alexa, dim zone 1 to 30%.
Alexa, dim zone 2 to 50%.
Alexa, turn off zone 1.
Alexa, turn off zone 2.
Alexa, turn on zone 1.
Alexa, turn on zone 2.
